comment: We are monitoring all twitter feeds and will pass on information as we get it. You can follow as well
amr:
# ::snt We are monitoring all twitter feeds and will pass on information as we get it. You can follow as well
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (m2 / monitor-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (f / feed
                        :mod (p / publication
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Twitter"))
                        :mod (a2 / all)))
            :op2 (p2 / pass-on-09
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (ii / information)
                  :time (g / get-01
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 ii)))
      :snt2 (p3 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (f2 / follow-02
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :mod (a3 / as-well))))
